Recommendations: 1. The faculty who have not conducted researches nor published and presented those they conducted be made to understand that research is part of their professional life. As members of the academe, they should be made aware of the four fold functions of the university: instruction, research, community involvement and production.
2. It is suggested that more researches on the improvement of instruction (especially in teaching English) be conducted. The results may be packaged for dissemination.

3. If funds are available, it is recommended that the College's research office be improved a new coat of paint and arrangement of furniture, better presentation of posters and purchase of an additional computer and printer and an LCD projector.

4. Please do not include documents which are not necessary. Kindly highlight the parts of the documents which pertain to the benchmark statement so the accreditor does not have to read the entire batch.
